oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photographic ID for 1st Lt. Allen Phillip Francis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A folded identification card for Allen Phillip Francis. The left half is a printed form with blanks filled with handwritten responses. At the top "337," name "Allen Philip Francis" rank "1st Lieut" above "2nd Lieut C.A.C. U.S.R." duty "student Army Heavy School" with "Battery C, 44th Artillery" interposed. Authorizing signature and Francis' signature at the bottom. Right half has photograph of Francis.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Francis, Allen Phillip
